      • addData

        public void addData(int dAge,
                    int dRSpeed,
                    java.lang.String dClas,
                    int posx,
                    int posy,
                    int ID,
                    java.lang.String name,
                    int resistence)
        Method to add a node with the data of the dragon to the list.
        Parameters:
        dAge - integer with the age of the dragon.
        dRSpeed - integer with the recharge speed of the dragon.
        dClas - string with the class of the dragon.
        posx - integer with the x position of the dragon.
        posy - integer with the y position of the dragon.
        ID - integer with the ID if the dragon.
        name - string with the name of the dragon.
        resistence - integer with the resistence of the dragon.

      • ageToDragon

        public DragonData ageToDragon(int age,
                              SendList list)
        Takes an age and gets the Dragon with that age. Happy Birthday Dragons!
        Parameters:
        age - int age of the dragon you want, basically
        list - DragonList you want to read
